article.headline: The NFL is trying to please fans - and the federal government is doing the same for stock market investors
article.body: For years I've written about how tax tricks targeted for giant corporations and rich investors, government subsidies and tax-avoidance loopholes, marketplace protections, and fiscal and monetary stimulus have created a Bubble-Blowing Bull Market environment that has artificially juiced investor gains. Here's an example from Oct. 20, 2014: The...
